Data.text_description:
The probability of employee performance being high (A=1) is 0.4412. 
For those with employee performance being low (A=0), the probability of appearance being high (B=1) is 0.5099. 
For those with employee performance being high (A=1), the probability of appearance being high (B=1) is 0.1558. 
For those with appearance being low (B=0), the probability of blood pressure being high (C=1) is 0.3433. 
For those with appearance being high (B=1), the probability of blood pressure being high (C=1) is 0.6728. 
For those with employee performance being low (A=0), the probability of air pressure being high (D=1) is 0.6565. 
For those with employee performance being high (A=1), the probability of air pressure being high (D=1) is 0.6391.
